terms: By selecting any of the options, the Passenger agrees that if the pre-ordered meal is not made available onboard to the Passenger, Spicejet has the right to offer an alternate meal (as per availability) or a full refund (by way of a voucher of the equivalent value paid by the Passenger for the meal), at its discretion and without any further liability.

Hot meals are only available for sale on Boeing flights with block time of 76 Mins and above. Hot beverages are available on Boeing Flights with block time of 51 mins and above & Q-400 flights with Block time of 76 mins and above.
Sendha namak is used for all Navratra meals.
Kid’s meal includes a vegetarian mini burger, a fruit juice, a chocolate bar and a pack of potato chips, along with a take-away airplane shaped bag.
